channel.title: c0c0n2020 on Winja
channel.description: Recent content in c0c0n2020 on Winja

item.title: Write-ups for Winja CTF #c0c0nXIII
item.description: Winja successfully conducted a 3 hour, 8 levels, and 24 challenges long CTF competition on 19th September 2020, during the c0c0n 2020 virtual conference.

item.title: Winja CTF | c0c0n XIII
item.description: Winja organised Capture-the-Flag competition for all, women and men participants, at c0c0n 2020 security and hacking virtual conference.
